channel.title: klangsynthese on elektrophon

item.title: ringmodulation
item.description: amplitude modulation In amplitude modulation the amplitude (signal strength) of the carrier changes in proportion to the message signal. $$ \begin{array}{c} c(t) = A \sin(2 \pi f_c t)\, \end{array} $$ Where A is the amplitude of the carrier singal and the function of f the modulation signal. Amplitude Modulation is a multiplication of the two signals. 2021-11-21T14:49:58.543465 image/svg+xml Matplotlib v3.
